sentences: This section of the SPM was addressed briefly in plenary early on Friday morning.
In the draft SPM, the only sentence under this topic indicated that a selection of policy-relevant robust key findings and key uncertainties is provided in Topic 6 of the longer report.
During the week, a number of delegates called for expanding the section in the SPM by providing substantive lists of robust findings and key uncertainties.
Germany proposed that the section be moved to the beginning of the SPM.
Early on Friday morning, delegates agreed to delete the sentence and heading from the SPM, and only address robust findings and key uncertainties in the Longer Report.
